column5: Wondering if anyone has fished at this resort? Looks like a nice place. Thanks in advance
Hi Tailfin, We have been going to GRC twice a year for many years. Great placeThank you,Larry Mac
Our first Canada trip was to Ghost River.. We took our wives so we were looking for a place with good accomodations, food and fishing.. They met all of our expectations..
Thanks for the replys guys. Looks like there are to many lakes to fish in one week. I sure would like to catch a Lake Trout tho.
Hi Tailfin, Ghost River has Lake Trout in Zarn Lake. It is a portage lake and a very good Lake Trout Lake in the spring and fall. Have a great yearThank you,Larry Mac
Ghost River is a great place to fish. Quality fish with plenty of portage lakes. I would highly recommend giving this resort a try.
